name: arrayMid
description: Extracts a sub array from an existing array.

params.name: start
params.description: The position of the first element to retrieve

params.name: count
params.description: The number of elements to extract. If not set, all elements up to the end of the array will be returned.

examples.title: Using only the start parameter
examples.description: Lucee4.5+ Extract elements from an array staring with element 5 and ending with the last element of the array.

examples.title: Using the count parameter to specify the number of elements to include
examples.description: Lucee4.5+ Extract 4 elements from an array staring with element 3.
